> One of my gameplay frustrations is how much health you can lose due 
to one whack from a mage or archmage. Its been more and more of an 
issue lately as I take my one-man thief team through the levels during 
lunch breaks at work :-)

The amount of mana put into an archmage's basic attack depends on how 
much available mana it has.  It's a very strong weakness because if an 
opponent has multiple spells of protection around it, you'll waste 
your mana removing those spells of protection.

I'd like to add another one: My cleric raises skeletons of inconsisent 
experience levels, even when the source is exact same (both level 
number and team number).
